DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to collect data on the prevalence and clinical significance of elevated cardiac troponin in a large registry of unselected patients with atrial fibrillation presenting to an emergency department.
DOC.brief_title: High Sensitivity Cardiac Troponin T in Patients With Atrial Fibrillation Admitted to an Emergency Department (ED)
DOC.criteria: documented atrial fibrillation in admission EKG or diagnosis of atrial fibrillation at admission. no patients are excluded.
